definitions: the action of inspecting or looking at something

examples.text: the owner may allow viewing by appointment

shortDefinitions: action of inspecting or looking at something

definitions: the action of watching something on television

examples.text: it is quite unsuitable for family viewing

shortDefinitions: action of watching something on television

definitions: an opportunity to see something, especially a work of art

examples.text: a private viewing of the paintings

definitions: the act or ceremony of paying one's respect to a corpse.
shortDefinitions: act or ceremony of paying one's respect to corpse
